page.title: 15Nuclear Waste:Social Concern
page.content: Land owned by the C.E.G.B has been put forward as a possible site to{dump {nuclear waste.}This has caused a lot of concern in the area with many letters written to the press. The{ {local council}mave many views on this proposal. The leader of the town council pointed out that one of the main problems was in the{transport of {waste}to the site. Road or rail accidents could happen away from the site. Industry might not want to move into the area if this waste is so near. Many people would move out. The {local people will fight}to keep this waste away from this area which already has too much{dangerous {industry.}School children, residents and many other local people have already written to the local newspaper.
